channel.title: tech on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in tech on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-31
item.description: Tesla launches ‘TeslaMic,’ a microphone for in-car karaoke (2 minute read) Tesla has launched a microphone designed for its in-car karaoke system.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-18
item.description: The PinePhone Pro brings upgraded hardware to the Linux phone (3 minute read) Pine64 is now taking preorders for the PinePhone Pro, the fastest mainline Linux smartphone on the market.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-06
item.description: Apple Reportedly in Talks With Toyota About Apple Car Production Starting 2024 (2 minute read) Apple is rumored to be visiting several car manufacturers in Asia to mass-produce a branded car by 2024.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-16
item.description: Excerpt: How Google bought Android—according to folks in the room (12 minute read) A new book from a long-time Android engineer offers a behind-the-scenes look at early Android development.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-28
item.description: Tencent’s WeChat suspends new user registration in China to comply with ‘relevant laws and regulations’ (2 minute read) WeChat has temporarily suspended registrations for new users in China while it upgrades its security technology to align with all relevant laws and regulations.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-04
item.description: Samsung officially confirms Galaxy S21 event for January 14th (1 minute read) Samsung will announce its latest lineup of Galaxy flagship phones on January 14th.
